title: Deliver On-site Workshop
description: A consultant travels to a customer's office to deliver a two-day, on-site implementation workshop.

tasks.description: Coordinate travel logistics and workshop requirements (e.g., meeting room, projector) with the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: All logistics are planned and confirmed.

tasks.description: Facilitate the two-day workshop, guiding the customer's team through hands-on configuration and setup exercises.
tasks.expected_outcome: The workshop is successfully delivered, and the customer's team is empowered.

tasks.description: Provide a summary report of the workshop outcomes and next steps for the project.
tasks.expected_outcome: The consultant provides a clear path forward for the customer.
